intro.description: The next steps show you how to import the installed library of Test Cases into the database.

item.title: Select the Project to import
item.description:
Browse to:
guidancer/aut/testCaseLibrary
and select:
unbound_modules_concrete.xml

item.title: Confirm the selection
item.description: Click OK in the file chooser

item.title: Import the Project
item.description: In the import Project dialog, deactivate the checkbox to open the Project when it is imported.
